languages.text: {n}Полчаса спустя из комм-бусины доносится взволнованный голос Вигдис:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, пришло донесение из отсека для шаттлов. Ксенос Ирлиэт... покинула корабль вместе с незадачливым пилотом, поверившим, что доставить ее на Кетца Темер — личный приказ Вольного Торговца. Приказ, который он не смел оспорить. Как только шаттл достиг поверхности планеты, связь сразу же оборвалась. Боюсь, их след утерян".

{n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."
languages.original_text: {n}Полчаса спустя из комм-бусины доносится взволнованный голос Вигдис:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, пришло донесение из отсека для шаттлов. Ксенос Ирлиэт... покинула корабль вместе с незадачливым пилотом, поверившим, что доставить ее на Кетца Темер — личный приказ Вольного Торговца. Приказ, который он не смел оспорить. Как только шаттл достиг поверхности планеты, связь сразу же оборвалась. Боюсь, их след утерян".

Once the shuttle had reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

languages.text: {n}30分後、通信機からヴォクス・マスターの緊張した声が聞こえてくる：{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、シャトルベイから報告が来ました。異種族、ユリエットが…ケツァ・テメルへの移送は自由開拓者から個別に受けた命令であると、不運なパイロットを説得し、出発したそうです。パイロットは、従うほかありませんでした。地表に到達後、シャトルからの一切の通信はロストしました。追跡はそこで途絶えています」
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

traits.locale_text: {n}30分後、通信機からヴォクス・マスターの緊張した声が聞こえてくる：{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、シャトルベイから報告が来ました。異種族、ユリエットが…ケツァ・テメルへの移送は自由開拓者から個別に受けた命令であると、不運なパイロットを説得し、出発したそうです。パイロットは、従うほかありませんでした。地表に到達後、シャトルからの一切の通信はロストしました。追跡はそこで途絶えています」

languages.text: {n}半个小时之后，你的通讯珠中传来了音阵大师紧张的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，穿梭机机舱传来报告，说异形伊莉耶特离开了……她说服了一名倒霉的飞行员，说行商浪人本人下令将她送到格扎尔特默。飞行员别无选择，只能服从命令。穿梭机抵达行星表面之后就失去了联系，后面的情况就都不清楚了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

traits.locale_text: {n}半个小时之后，你的通讯珠中传来了音阵大师紧张的声音。{/n}“舰长大人，穿梭机机舱传来报告，说异形伊莉耶特离开了……她说服了一名倒霉的飞行员，说行商浪人本人下令将她送到格扎尔特默。飞行员别无选择，只能服从命令。穿梭机抵达行星表面之后就失去了联系，后面的情况就都不清楚了。”

languages.text: {n}Une demi-heure plus tard, la voix nerveuse du maître-vox s'élève du communicateur :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un rapport de la baie des navettes. La xénos Yrliet... est partie après avoir convaincu un malheureux pilote que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait ordonné qu'elle soit transportée jusqu'à Quetza Temer. Le pilote a estimé n'avoir d'autre choix que de s'exécuter. Une fois que la navette a atteint la surface, nous avons perdu le contact. Et leur piste. »
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une demi-heure plus tard, la voix nerveuse du maître-vox s'élève du communicateur :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un rapport de la baie des navettes. La xénos Yrliet... est partie après avoir convaincu un malheureux pilote que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait ordonné qu'elle soit transportée jusqu'à Quetza Temer. Le pilote a estimé n'avoir d'autre choix que de s'exécuter. Une fois que la navette a atteint la surface, nous avons perdu le contact. Et leur piste. »

languages.text: {n}Media hora más tarde escuchas la voz nerviosa de la maestra de vocos por tu cuenta de comunicaciones:{/n} «Lord Capitán, informe de la bahía de lanzaderas. La xenos, Yrliet... se ha marchado tras convencer a un piloto de que era voluntad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que fuera transportada a Quetza Temer. El piloto no tenía otra opción que obedecer. Cuando la lanzadera llegó a la superficie, perdimos el contacto. El rastro termina ahí».
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

traits.locale_text: {n}Media hora más tarde escuchas la voz nerviosa de la maestra de vocos por tu cuenta de comunicaciones:{/n} «Lord Capitán, informe de la bahía de lanzaderas. La xenos, Yrliet... se ha marchado tras convencer a un piloto de que era voluntad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que fuera transportada a Quetza Temer. El piloto no tenía otra opción que obedecer. Cuando la lanzadera llegó a la superficie, perdimos el contacto. El rastro termina ahí».

languages.text: {n}Eine halbe Stunde später ertönt die nervöse Stimme der Voxmeisterin aus dem Kommunikationssystem:{/n} "Lord Captain, ich habe eben einen Bericht aus der Shuttlebucht erhalten. Die Xenos Yrliet ... ist abgereist, nachdem sie einen unglückseligen Piloten überzeugt hatte, dass sie auf persönlichen Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nach Quetza Temer gebracht werden soll. Der Pilot sah keine andere Option, als Ihr Folge zu leisten. Als das Shuttle die Oberfläche erreichte, brach der Kontakt ab. Dort endet ihre Spur."
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine halbe Stunde später ertönt die nervöse Stimme der Voxmeisterin aus dem Kommunikationssystem:{/n} "Lord Captain, ich habe eben einen Bericht aus der Shuttlebucht erhalten. Die Xenos Yrlies ... ist abgereist, nachdem sie einen unglückseligen Piloten überzeugt hatte, dass sie auf persönlichen Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nach Quetza Temer gebracht werden soll. Der Pilot sah keine andere Option, als Ihr Folge zu leisten. Als das Shuttle die Oberfläche erreichte, brach der Kontakt ab. Dort endet ihre Spur."

languages.text: {n}Yarım saat sonra mikro telsizden Voks Üstadı'nın kaygılı sesi geliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, mekik bölümünden bir rapor geldi. Yrliet adlı zeno... Bahtsız pilotun birini kandırarak Hür Tacir'in özel emriyle Quetza Temer'e ulaşması gerektiğine inandırmış. Pilot da ona uymuş. Mekik yüzeye ulaştığında tüm iletişim kesilmiş. Bildiklerimiz bu kadar."
languages.original_text: {n}Half an hour later, you hear the Vox Master's nervous voice from the comm-bead:{/n} "Lord Captain, a report came in from the shuttle bay. The xenos Yrliet... has departed after convincing a hapless pilot that it was the Rogue Trader's personal order for her to be transported to Quetza Temer. The pilot saw no other option but to comply. Once the shuttle reached the surface, all contact with it was lost. That is where their trail ends."
